title: Google\Cloud\BigQuery\Migration\V2\TranslationConfigDetails
name: TranslationConfigDetails
description:
The translation config to capture necessary settings for a translation task and subtask.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.bigquery.migration.v2.TranslationConfigDetails

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.gcs_source_path
params.description: The Cloud Storage path for a directory of files to translate in a task.

params.name: data.gcs_target_path
params.description: The Cloud Storage path to write back the corresponding input files to.

params.name: data.target_dialect
params.description: The target dialect for the engine to translate the input to.

params.name: data.name_mapping_list
params.description: The mapping of objects to their desired output names in list form.

params.name: data.source_env
params.description: The default source environment values for the translation.
